entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 23 except 17 near Lake Ontario.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 23 except 17 near Lake Ontario. Humidex 26. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
